column1: HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,New logo design for the project,[],"Hi, I want to design a new logo for the project completely free..."

HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,gradient grey overlay bottom button zone when zooming in images,"[Label(name=""bug"")]","Using the up-to-date fdroid version of anecdote, i can zoom in pictures (CommitStrip,...)
However, when doing this, the image comes full screen but an overlay of gradient gray subsides with sharing components at the bottom.
I'll update and post a screenshot, better than a thousand words, when i get back to a computer."

HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,Can't zoom in pictures,[],It would be nice to be able to zoom on a picture when opened in full-screen. At the moment the picture take all possible space but sometimes it is quite hard to read a CommitStrip for example.
HugoGresse/Anecdote,open,NSF not working anymore,[],"First of all thanks for your great app.
Unfortunately, the app do not load Nuit Sans Folie anymore (error 406), et c'est vraiment dommage :(."
HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,remove codesponsor,[],Pull request automatically sent by knewzen <https://github.com/knewzen>. Because Code Sponsor is shutting down on December 8

HugoGresse/Anecdote,open,Add DTC comments with DTCrawler,"[Label(name=""enhancement"")]","Salut, je sais pas si tu travailles encore sur le développement d'Anecdote mais je me demandais si il était possible que tu rajoutes les commentaires des quotes.
Je suis tombé sur [DTCrawler ](https://github.com/Emeraude/DTCrawler) qui permet de créer une API qui renvoie du JSON avec toutes les infos d'une quote (ses commentaires, ses votes, etc..)

HugoGresse/Anecdote,open,VDM/FML Notice of default,[],"I was noticed by Beta & Compagnie that I'm no longer allowed to use VDM/FML brand and their content within the app. I'll try to find a solution with them. In the meantime, if you have any good arguments or precedent issue like this, let me know. "
HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,Russian translation update,[],Very small changes actually.
HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,Favoris,[],"- use ObjectBox to store Anecdote
- favorites are dynamically injected into received Anecdote

column2: <string name=""open_intent_browser_error"" modified=""true"">Не открываются детали, проверьте конфиг. адреса</string>

<string name=""app_long_description"" modified=""true"">Особенности: 9GAG фид (изображения и видео) с 9GAG Hot, Trending and Fresh             - xkcd             - фиды цитат с fmylife.com (FML), Bash.org, viedemerde.fr (VDM), danstonchat.com (DTC) и более             - простой и эффективный интерфейс          - бесконечный скролл и протяжка для обновления
- нет странных разрешений, нет фоновых заданий
- добавление своего веб-сайта нужно немного знать html  
 Anecdote - это простое и мощное приложение для чтения сайтов цитат. Очень легкое, быстрое и простое. 
С открытым исходным кодом на GitHub: https://github.com/HugoGresse/Anecdote          Контент, отображаемый в приложении не принадлежит Anecdote.</string>
<string name=""pref_rowstriping_summary"" modified=""true"">Доб-ть фон для разделения цитат</string>
<string name=""error_server_unknown"" modified=""true"">Что-то не так с сервером</string>

<string-array name=""pref_textsize_title""><item index=""3"">крупных</item><item index=""4"">сверхбольшой</item><item index=""1"">маленький</item><item index=""2"">средних</item><item index=""0"">чрезмерно малых</item></string-array>
<string name=""action_restore_summary"" modified=""true"">Удалить все вебсайты из приложения. М.б. полезно для нерабочих.</string>
<string name=""dialog_website_error_itemperpage"" modified=""true"">Пункт на страницу д.б. больше 0</string>
<string name=""app_migration_1_0_0"" modified=""true"">Миграция на новую версию Anecdote</string>
<string name=""app_short_description"" modified=""true"">Новые цитаты (9GAG, FML, Bash.org, xkcd) каждый день в простом приложении.</string>
<string name=""error_processing"" modified=""true"">Что-то не так, пробуйте другие настройки вебсайта</string>
<string name=""about_contentbelonging"" modified=""true"">Содержимое приложения не принадлежит Anecdote.</string>

column1: clipboard content pasting breack formatting in my case."
HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,Return to app,"[Label(name=""enhancement"")]",On about page we can't go back to the app. Add a link on the name of the app on top bar

HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,[Feature Request] Download button,"[Label(name=""enhancement"")]",It would be nice having a possibility to download pictures and GIFs to show them offline to friends. Maybe even to download posts (text only) as pictures.

HugoGresse/Anecdote,open,[Feature Request] Swipe in full screen to next picture,"[Label(name=""enhancement"")]","Would be nice, when it is possible to swipe between pictures, when they are in full screen"
HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,Pictures with huge hight are very small,[],"This is caused by the fact, that the place for a pic has always the same size, regardless to its format"
HugoGresse/Anecdote,open,Picture not centred when in full screen,"[Label(name=""bug"")]","I tab on a picture and it goes in full screen.
Actually: The first time it isn't centred.
Fix: Go back and tab again on a picture and it is centred"
HugoGresse/Anecdote,open,Random anecdote from dtc doesn't load automatically,[],"The random anectode view doesn't load automatically when selecting it. You have to manually load it
With the last version from fdroid"
Anecdote is an app I've waited for a very long time but unfortunately I'm having a hard time to add a custom website because of little HTML knowledge.
Would really appreciate a small beginner guide on how to do this. :)"
HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,Only one xkcd after reloading,"[Label(name=""bug"")]","Go to xkcd and see multiple entries. Reload and you see only one.
Fix: Go to another website and back to xkcd"
HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,Move restore websites to advanced settings,[],

HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,"Copy an anecdote only copy the word ""anecdote""","[Label(name=""bug"")]","If you press the copy button under an anecdote it will only copy the word ""anecdote"" and not the anecdote itself
I tested it on se coucher moins bete feed"
HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,Manage one item per page,[],Fix XKCD loading issue when list too short https://github.com/HugoGresse/Anecdote/issues/26

I expect it will disappear when switching to a site with correct configuration"

HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,"Remove some ""translatable=false""","[Label(name=""enhancement"")]","Can you remove some ""translatable=false"" in strings.xml, e.g. from error_server_unknown or about_libraries (so I can translate the ""by"")"

HugoGresse/Anecdote,closed,Show media when se coucher moins bete quotes have one,[Label(name=""enhancement"")]","Some quote have picture or video in it, it would be nice to be able to see them in the app. Like seeing the picture and having the link or the video.

HugoGresse/Anecdote,open,Se coucher moins bete extra media/text isn't displayed,"[Label(name=""enhancement""), Label(name=""help wanted"")]","Some quotes have an extra bit of text or media which isn't displayed in the main page of the site but is if you select it (like this one http://secouchermoinsbete.fr/70692-le-canal-du-panama-a-ete-lucratif-pour-les-etats-unis)
It would be nice if the app displayed the full text"
